Creating Investable Cities in Post-COVID-19 Asia-Pacific - Enhancing Competitiveness and Resilience through Quality 
Infrastructure (KSTA REG 54036-001) 
 
OUTLINE OF SELECTION CRITERIA FOR CITIES 
 
To leverage ongoing PPP-TG work on enabling environment for private sector participation and 
PPPs, the partner cities will be selected from among those countries that are currently monitored 
in the 2nd edition of the PPP Monitor, and any new countries added to the future editions of the 
PPP Monitor going forward. 
 
While still being finalized, it is expected that our initial target cities will have some of these 
indicative characteristics: 
 
•  1-5 million people;  
•  Net surplus;  
•  City leadership comprised of reform-champions with MOF support;  
•  Strong existing ADB relationships;  
•  Leverage on-going RD/SDCC assistance 
•  Strong enabling environment for private sector participation in municipal infrastructure 
•  Deepening capital markets 
 
The final selection of cities will be developed based on a combination of the findings of the legal 
frameworks. In the selection of the cities, the TA will closely coordinate with the RDs and the RMs 
to leverage ongoing and planned RD pipelines.
